    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:76ed3e40-3c19-4cf0-aa68-8390d37e8305</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>76ed3e40-3c19-4cf0-aa68-8390d37e8305</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az emberi tulajdonságok öröklődése</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Inheritance Of Human Characteristics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Erbschaft Der Menschlichen Eigenschaften</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Transmission des Caractéristiques Humaines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Inheritance De Características Humanas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Eredità Delle Caratteristiche Umane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κληρονομιά των ανθρώπινων χαρακτηριστικών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Herencia De Características Humanas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Néhány emberi tulajdonság öröklődésének bemutatása (vércsoportok, albinizmus, fenilketonuria, vörös-zöld színtévesztés, vérzékenység); a családfa és a családfa-elemzés</string>
            <string language="en-US">Presentation of the Inheritance of Some Human Characteristics (Blood Types, Albinism, Phenylketonuria, Red-Green Colourblindness, Haemophilia); The Family-tree and the Family-tree Analysis</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">genetika</string>
            <string language="en-US">genetics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">öröklődés</string>
            <string language="en-US">inheritance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">humángenetika</string>
            <string language="en-US">human genetics</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der Erbschaft einiger menschlicher 
Eigenschaften (Blut-Typen, Albinism, Phenylketonuria, Rot-Grünes 
Colourblindness, Hämophilie); Der Familie-Baum und die 
Familie-Baum Analyse</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation de la transmission de certaines 
caractéristiques humaines (types de sang, albinisme, Phenylketonuria,
Colourblindness Rouge-Vert, hémophilie) ; Le Famille-arbre et 
l'analyse de Famille-arbre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação do inheritance de algumas 
características humanas (tipos do sangue, albinism, Phenylketonuria, 
Colourblindness Vermelho-Verde, haemophilia); A Família-árvore
e a análise da Família-árvore</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione dell'eredità di alcune 
caratteristiche umane (tipi di anima, albinismo, Phenylketonuria, 
Colourblindness Rosso-Verde, haemophilia); L'Famiglia-albero e 
l'analisi dell'Famiglia-albero</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση της κληρονομιάς μερικών ανθρώπινων 
χαρακτηριστικών (τύποι αίματος, albinism, φαινυλκετονουρία, 
κόκκινος-πράσινο Colourblindness, αιμοφιλία)  Το 
οικογένεια-δέντρο και η ανάλυση οικογένεια-δέντρων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de la herencia de algunas 
características humanas (tipos de la sangre, albinismo, 
Phenylketonuria, Colourblindness Rojo-Verde, hemofilia); El 
Familia-a'rbol y el análisis del Familia-a'rbol</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Genetik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erbschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">menschliche Genetik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la génétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la génétique humaine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">genetics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inheritance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">genetics humano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la genetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">eredità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la genetica umana</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
